title: Water Flask
question: I will use a reusable water bottle/flask instead of purchasing disposable water bottles

title: Turn Off Faucet
question: I will turn off the water faucet while I am brushing my teeth or showering

title: Laundry
question: I will do laundry once a week and with cold water

title: Showers
question: I will take a faster shower and turn off water when soaping
